products.description: The traditional way to brew coffee in Costa Rica is by using a “Chorreador”.The name comes from the Spanish verb “chorrear” which means “to drip” it consists of a wooden stand with a hole at the top that holds a cloth bag (bolsita) used as a reusable filter, It’s perfectly normal for the cloth filter to turn brown, but this will not affect or change the taste of the coffee actually "La Bolsita" is "cured" with prolonged use, which makes the coffee taste better every day! A filter can be used for as long as 3 months, just rinse it in warm water after each use without any kind of soap.

products.title: MULTIPLEX Shuddi Organic Eco-friendly Multipurpose Cleaner, 1 L
products.description: Multiplex shuddi is a bioremediation and cleaning product which is produced by naturally occurring microorganisms. This ecofriendly product is extremely efficient in removing dirt, stains and in killing the harmful germs, controls odour, cleans drainage clogs and prevents further blockage, reduces contamination buildup, thereby keeps the surroundings, applied surface/ area clean and hygienic. It also acts as repellent to houseflies, mosquitoes, cockroaches, rats etc. For Toilet Cleaning: Prepare required quantity of solution by mixing 10 ml of Multiplex Shuddi in one litre of water. Sprinkle on toilet uniformly, allow it to stay for 2 to 3 hours and clean with water. For better results allow solution to stay over night before cleaning. For Floor Cleaning: Prepare required quantity of solution by mixing 10 ml of Multiplex Shuddi in 8-10 litres of water (Approx. one bucket) & mop the floor thoroughly. For Open Drainages: Spray/ Sprinkle 5 ml of Multiplex Shuddi uniformly on one square meter of open drainage. For better results repeat the application at 15 days interval. For Garbage Dumping Yards: Dilute 1 litre of Multiplex Shuddi in 10 litres of clean water. Spray/ Sprinkle 10 litres of prepared solution of Multiplex Shuddi uniformly over one metric ton of garbage. For better results we recommend 3 applications at 15 days interval. For Cleaning Animal Sheds: Prepare required quantity of solution by mixing 5 ml of Multiplex Shuddi in one litre of water. Spray/ Sprinkle on the shed area uniformly, allow it to stay for 2 to 3 hours and clean with water. For best results allow solution to stay over night before cleaning. Repeat the application at 15 days interval. For Animal Body: Prepare required quantity of solution by mixing 2.5 ml of Multiplex Shuddi in one litre of water & apply liberally on animal body and allow to stay for 2 hours and wash animal body with clean water.
